name: A Completely Normal Space Game
description:
The Company thank you for your service! 

Fly a spaceship directly into an anomaly - it's probably not going to atomise you!

------------------------------

LMB - turn left

RMB - turn right

LMB + RMB - boost

Mouse Wheel - zoom in and out

Smash into asteroids to build up energy, then head to the exit. 

There're no sounds, because there is no sound in space! Or maybe I didn't have time to add any.
